Zipaquirá.title: Zipaquirá
Zipaquirá.byline: Zipaquirá is a cute colonial town of some 70,000 people about an hour north of Bogotá in the Cundinamarca province.

Zipolite.title: Zipolite
Zipolite.byline: Zipolite is a growing backpacker beach destination along the south-western Pacific coast of Oaxaca, Mexico.
